title: Parameters for lanelet2 map loader Node

enable_differential_map_loading.description: Flag to enable loading of differential map

allow_unsupported_version.description: Flag to load unsupported format_version anyway. If true, just prints warning.

center_line_resolution.description: Resolution of the Lanelet center line [m]

use_waypoints.description: If true, `centerline` in the Lanelet2 map will be used as a `waypoints` tag.

lanelet2_map_path.description: The lanelet2 map path pointing to the .osm file

min_x.description: When the dynamic map loading is true and the map is a single file, this is the minimum x value of the map

min_y.description: When the dynamic map loading is true and the map is a single file, this is the minimum y value of the map

x_resolution.description: When the dynamic map loading is true and the map is a single file, this is the resolution of the x axis

y_resolution.description: When the dynamic map loading is true and the map is a single file, this is the resolution of the y axis
